edu.umass.cs.msocket

Class ConnectionInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.msocket.ConnectionInfo

  • public class ConnectionInfo
extends Object
    This class keeps the state associated for MSocket like socket maps, connection state. This class implements many core functionalities in MSocket. Each MSocket has an associated connectionInfo object.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int interfaceNumToUse
      for implementing uniform policy
